## Load libraries
```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Load data
```{r load data, include = FALSE}
site = "PuntaPitt2_HeatStress_03-26-2019"
PAMdata <- read_csv("/Users/loga8761/Google Drive/Galapagos/CBASS/CBASS_PuntaPitt2_March2019/2019_03_26_heat_PuntaPitt_foranalysis.csv")
```

## Scatterplot with lm fit by species
```{r scatterplot}
ggplot(PAMdata,aes(x = Treatment, y = PAM)) +
  geom_point() +
  aes(color = Species) +
  theme_bw() +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ exp(x)) + # try exponential model
  ggtitle(site) +
  ggsave(file=paste0(site,"_scatter.png"), width = 5, height = 3)
```


## Boxplot by species
```{r boxplot}
ggplot(PAMdata,aes(x = Treatment, y = PAM, color = Species)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  aes(group = Treatment) +
  facet_grid(. ~ Species) +
  theme_bw() +
  ggtitle(site) +
  ggsave(file=paste0(site,"_boxplot.png"), width = 5, height = 3)
```

## Exponential model fitting & stats
```{r model fitting}
mod_exp <- lm(PAM ~ exp(Treatment) + Species, data = PAMdata)
summary(mod_exp)
```
## 2 way ANOVA model fitting & Tukey HSD
```{r ANOVA}
mod_anova <- aov(PAM ~ factor(Treatment) + Species, data = PAMdata)
summary(mod_anova)
TukeyHSD(mod_anova)
```
